net.atos.kawwaportal.components.components

Class Kawwa2Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.atos.kawwaportal.components.components.Kawwa2Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.tapestry5.ClientElement

    @SupportsInformalParameters
@Events(value="rowPerPageSelectionEvent")
public class Kawwa2Grid
extends Object
implements org.apache.tapestry5.ClientElement
    Component Parameters
    NameDescriptionTypeFlagsDefaultDefault PrefixSince
    addStringliteral
    clientIdStringliteral
    criteriumThis object is used to create a filter form that can be used to filter available rows. If null then no filter form is created. When the form will be submitted, Tapestry will propagate 2 events : KawwaEventsConstants.UPDATE_GRID_DATA_SOURCE and KawwaEventsConstants.RESET_GRID_DATA_SOURCE_FILTER. You can create method catching these events, and filter your data source.Objectprop
    defaultRowPerPageThe number of rows of data displayed on each page. If there are more rows than will fit, the Grid will divide up the rows into "pages" and (normally) provide a pager to allow the user to navigate within the overall result set.int10prop
    emptyorg.apache.tapestry5.Blockblock:emptyliteral
    encoderorg.apache.tapestry5.ValueEncoderprop
    excludeStringliteral
    filterHeaderHeader of the block containing the Filter formStringmessage:filterHeaderprop
    inPlaceif true, then the Kawwa2Grid is plainly ajax (pagination and sort) We had to declare a parameter instead of using the kgrid component's published parameter "inplace" because we had to pass this param to an inner component (Kawwa2Nav)booleanprop
    includeStringliteral
    informationThis parameter is used to set the value for the Caption element, and the summary attribute of the HTML Table.org.got5.tapestry5.jquery.internal.TableInformationprop
    maxAgeMax age in seconds for the number of row per page cookieintliteral:604800literal
    modelorg.apache.tapestry5.beaneditor.BeanModelprop
    navigatorOptionsStringliteral
    overridesorg.apache.tapestry5.PropertyOverridesNot Nullthisprop
    pagerPositionDefines where the pager (used to navigate within the "pages" of results) should be displayed: "top", "bottom", "both" or "none".org.apache.tapestry5.corelib.data.GridPagerPositionbothliteral
    pagesPerSetNumber of pages in set to be shown in kawwaGridPagerintprop
    reorderStringliteral
    resetLabelValue for the reset input of the Filter formStringmessage:resetLabelprop
    rowObjectprop
    rowsPerPageRows per page to display in the grid.intprop
    sourceContains the information for which the grid table is to be created.org.apache.tapestry5.grid.GridDataSourceRequiredprop
    submitLabelValue for the submit input of the Filter formStringmessage:submitLabelprop
    tableClassHelps to configure look and feel of the table rows.Stringprop
